language.name: English (Minecraft 1.2.5)
multiplayer.texturePrompt.line1: This server recommends the use of a custom texture pack.
multiplayer.requiredTexturePrompt.line1: This server requires the use of a custom texture pack.
multiplayer.requiredTexturePrompt.line2: Rejecting this custom texture pack will disconnect you from this server.
multiplayer.requiredTexturePrompt.discon: Server requires a custom texture pack
multiplayer.texturePrompt.failure.line1: Server texture pack couldn't be applied
demo.day.1: This demo will last five game days, do your best!
demo.day.6: You have passed your fifth day, use %s to save a screenshot of your creation
demo.reminder: The demo time has expired, buy the game to continue or start a new world!
demo.help.movement: Use %1$s, %2$s, %3$s, %4$s and the mouse to move around
resourcePack.title: Select Texture Packs
deathScreen.title: You died!
